header.title: Treatise Number One: The Art of True Living
header.category: New Thought, Mind Science, Esoteric Self-Help

central_thesis: The central thesis is that within every individual resides a 'Great Power' or 'Divine Source'—variously called Supreme Intelligence, God Himself, Inner Voice, or Universal Supply—which, when consciously accessed and utilized through ancient, secret Oriental methods (Mentalphysics), can unlock exceptional health, wealth, happiness, and the fulfillment of all desires and ambitions, leading to mastery of one's destiny and a life of 'ten times greater' accomplishment than previously thought possible.

structure_content.chapter_title: Note on Edwin J. Dingle, F.R.G.S.
structure_content.summary: This section introduces Edwin J. Dingle as an accomplished explorer and geographer who spent 21 years in Asia, particularly Tibet, where he received esoteric guidance in ancient practices. This experience reportedly restored him to 'perfection' and led him to found 'The Science of Mentalphysics,' presented as a unique and powerful 'Inner Teaching' for the Western world.

structure_content.chapter_title: A Strange Message From A Land Where The Art Has Not Been Forgotten
structure_content.summary: Dingle claims to deliver a message from a distant land (Tibet) challenging Western beliefs about sickness, poverty, old age, and life's limitations. He asserts that individuals possess immense innate power to achieve abundant health, supreme happiness, astonishing mental capacity, and wealth 'far beyond reasonable hopes,' through ancient methods 'hidden away' from the Western world.

structure_content.chapter_title: A Three Thousand Year Old Legacy For You
structure_content.summary: Dingle positions himself as a conduit for truths passed down through a 3000-year 'UNBROKEN CHAIN OF WISE MEN' from the East. These methods aim to integrate truth 'to the very depths of the soul,' granting 'power undreamed of' and enabling escape from purely intellectual understanding. They are presented as 'comparatively simple methods' effective for personal transformation, material success, and combating illness and aging, also facilitating aid to loved ones.

structure_content.chapter_title: Be Master of Your Own Destiny & Long-Hidden Practices of The Wise Men
structure_content.summary: The text asserts that individuals are destined for self-mastery, free from external limitations. This is achieved by tapping into the 'mind-power of the ages' or 'God Himself.' The core revelation from Dingle's Oriental master is the practical application of this vast power in daily affairs, enabling the manifestation of plans and prayers 'ON EARTH, HERE AND NOW,' a knowledge largely ignored by Western science.

structure_content.chapter_title: Unbelievable Things Accomplished & The Easy Way of True Genius
structure_content.summary: Western materialism is blamed for hindering access to the Creator's wisdom. Eastern masters, using these methods, reportedly achieve 'unbelievable things' like extreme longevity, physical control (e.g., walking on hot coals, heat generation), and mastery over circumstances, feats Western science cannot replicate. True genius is described as listening to the 'INNER VOICE' (Divine Source), which provides creative inspiration.

structure_content.chapter_title: Hidden Wisdom From a Land of Miracles
structure_content.summary: The ancient wisdom, preserved in Tibet (a 'land of miracles') for millennia, is free from materialistic contamination. Dingle's personal training in a Tibetan monastery, gained through unique circumstances, enabled him to learn these 'carefully guarded secrets' which he now intends to disclose to set humanity free.

The knowledge imparts 'immense mind power,' control over self and others, and mastery in all fields. This is likened to a 'second wind' phenomenon in endurance, where one accesses a reserve of strength ten times greater than ordinary capacity, enabling extraordinary accomplishments.

structure_content.chapter_title: Get Your Share of the Flow of Abundance
structure_content.summary: Mentalphysics claims to reveal the 'real principles underlying the flow of abundance,' enabling the discovery of 'undreamed-of' resources and opportunities, metaphorically called 'acres of diamonds.' Lack and poverty are attributed to 'unknowing or unconscious interference with the law of Universal Supply,' which Mentalphysics aims to correct through developing the 'INNER EYE'.

structure_content.chapter_title: That Ambition Of Yours...You Can Accomplish a Ten Times Greater Success
structure_content.summary: An anecdote illustrates achieving 'ten times greater success' through what appears to be 'accident' or 'hard luck' (a sudden setback leading to a new, highly lucrative venture). Mentalphysics, however, offers intentional methods to achieve such accelerated success, allowing one to 'SLIDE to success like a toboggan speeding down hill'.

structure_content.chapter_title: Why Successful Men Cannot Tell You How To Succeed
structure_content.summary: The text argues that most successful individuals attribute their achievements to conventional factors, but actually succeed through 'pure accident' or unconscious alignment with hidden principles. Mentalphysics aims to provide a conscious, intentional path to success, distinguishing itself from ineffective Western 'go-getter' or 'success psychology' methods which often lead to stress and nervous collapse.

structure_content.chapter_title: Enjoy Glorious Health and Strength - Feel and Look Younger
structure_content.summary: Mentalphysics addresses health issues, weakness, and lack of vitality as consequences of 'MISUSE OF MIND POWER.' It promises to leverage the mind's 'TREMENDOUS INFLUENCE' for 'apparent miracles' in healing, prolonging youth, and rebuilding physical and spiritual well-being through accessible Eastern methods.

structure_content.chapter_title: Unbelievable Powers of Mind & Mind Makes People Sick or Well
structure_content.summary: This section details fantastic claims of Eastern masters' mind-over-body control, including extreme longevity, surviving harsh conditions, and generating bodily heat. It affirms that the mind profoundly controls the body's health, sickness, and lifespan, serving as a 'Great Healer' when correctly applied.

structure_content.chapter_title: Fear - Timidity - Inferiority Complex - Unsocial Habits - Worry Quickly Mastered
structure_content.summary: Mentalphysics focuses on mastering mental and emotional handicaps by transforming *feelings* rather than just thoughts. It introduces practices designed to inspire 'FEELINGS of confidence, happiness, superiority, faith, energy and ambition,' thereby cultivating self-reliance, courage, and a victorious demeanor.

structure_content.chapter_title: More Friends - Better Friends - Greater Influence Per Others - Success in Your Social Life
structure_content.summary: By connecting with the 'UNCONQUERABLE POWER' within, Mentalphysics helps individuals develop a 'magnetic personality,' 'poise, charm, magnetism,' and 'character.' This inner transformation is said to attract devoted friends, opportunities, and social success, making one an admired leader.

structure_content.chapter_title: Greater Mental Powers - Greater Development of Your Talents - Greater Knowledge
structure_content.summary: The system posits that true mental power, talent, and wisdom stem from 'INSPIRATION' from the 'Supreme Intelligence within,' rather than mere education. Mentalphysics teaches methods to call upon this 'SOURCE OF ALL INSPIRATION' to receive 'right ideas,' leading to originality, unerring judgment, and success in all professional and creative fields.

structure_content.chapter_title: Mentalphysics Offered At Minimum Cost & How the Great Messages Come to You
structure_content.summary: The course is offered for a 'minimum donation' ($5.00 enrollment, $2.00 monthly), framed as an investment yielding benefits worth 'hundreds, even thousands of dollars.' Initiates receive bi-weekly messages, photographic materials for practices, and direct guidance from Edwin J. Dingle throughout the 26-week course, culminating in a diploma.

structure_content.chapter_title: No Interference With Your Religion & Health By the Modern Way
structure_content.summary: Mentalphysics is presented as non-sectarian, supporting existing religious beliefs by helping realize the 'Divine spark of Creative Intelligence' within. It also claims compatibility with modern medical science, viewing the 'Divine spark' as the 'Greatest Healer of All,' capable of overcoming mental and emotional blocks that hinder natural healing.

structure_content.chapter_title: Begin Today to Live the Life You Ought to Live
structure_content.summary: This final section is a call to action, urging the reader to embrace Mentalphysics to achieve a life of radiant health, success, happiness, and vitality. It promises to enable the transformation into a 'magnificent' individual, free from fears and limitations, by applying the long-hidden methods disclosed in the course.

key_concepts.definition: A practical, philosophical, inspirational, and spiritual teaching founded by Edwin J. Dingle, based on ancient, guarded Eastern (Tibetan) methods. Its purpose is to help individuals access and utilize innate 'Great Power' for self-transformation and achievement.

key_concepts.term: Great Power / Divine Source / Supreme Intelligence / Inner Voice / Universal Supply
key_concepts.definition: The fundamental, omnipresent, and omnipotent power residing within every individual. It is the source of all potential for health, wealth, happiness, and success, often equated with 'God Himself' or the subconscious/superconscious mind.
A lineage of Eastern sages spanning over 3000 years, who preserved, refined, and passed down the 'Inner Teaching' (Mentalphysics methods) from generation to generation, guarding it from the unworthy.

A metaphorical faculty or heightened perception cultivated through Mentalphysics, enabling individuals to discern 'undreamed-of' resources, opportunities, and the 'acres of diamonds' (hidden wealth) in their immediate environment.

An analogy describing the access to an enormous, previously untapped reserve of personal power (mental, physical, spiritual), estimated to be 'ten times greater' than normal capacity, allowing for extraordinary accomplishments beyond perceived limits.

A core principle within Mentalphysics asserting that abundance and provisions are naturally available to all, and that 'lack' is caused by 'unknowing or unconscious interference' with this inherent flow.

An operative principle stating that true mastery over mental and emotional handicaps (e.g., fear, timidity, worry) comes from cultivating desired *feelings* rather than merely thinking about them. The methods specifically inspire these beneficial feelings.

The mechanism by which 'right ideas,' talents, and wisdom are received from the Supreme Intelligence or Inner Source. It is considered crucial for permanent success, originality, and unerring judgment, surpassing mere education or reason.

practical_system.description: Mentalphysics is a practical, systematic course designed to enable individuals to access and utilize the 'Great Power' within through 'ancient Tibetan methods' adapted for the modern mind. The system emphasizes cultivating desired *feelings* over mere intellectual thoughts, developing the 'Inner Eye' for opportunity, and aligning with the 'Law of Universal Supply' for manifestation. It involves a structured 26-week study program, guided by Edwin J. Dingle himself, combining intellectual understanding with operative practices.
tools: Initial treatise 'The Art of True Living'.
Bi-weekly messages ('Guidance for the Initiate,' 'Entering the Gate,' and subsequent weekly lessons).
Photographic material accompanying lessons for practical application.
Printed matter explaining the principles and methods.
Personal letters and direct guidance from Edwin J. Dingle (via personal service) (p. 10).
A Diploma awarded upon satisfactory completion of the 26-week Initiate Course (p. 9).
rituals: Regular study of bi-weekly messages (manuscripts, printed matter) detailing principles and methods (p. 9).
Application of the 'Method Itself' and other disclosed practices for personal transformation (p. 9).
Working with 'photographic material' provided for specific practices (p. 9).
Practicing methods to cultivate specific 'FEELINGS of confidence, happiness, superiority, faith, energy and ambition' (p. 7).
Engaging in practices designed to 'get in touch with' the 'UNCONQUERABLE POWER' within (p. 8).
Learning and consciously applying the 'principle of UNIVERSAL SUPPLY' to attract abundance (p. 5).
Practicing methods to 'command' the subconscious mind for 'great works, original ideas,' and unerring judgment (p. 8).

critical_analysis.relevance: Mentalphysics is a significant contribution to the early 20th-century New Thought and Mind Science movements, particularly with its syncretic blend of romanticized Eastern (specifically Tibetan) esotericism with Western self-help and prosperity gospel. It resonates with contemporaneous occult currents emphasizing mental causation and the 'power of thought.' Dingle's system distinguishes itself by claiming direct transmission from an 'unbroken chain of wise men' in a Tibetan monastery, providing a unique origin narrative that grants it an aura of ancient, guarded authenticity. This positioning contrasts with other New Thought authors who often grounded their teachings more broadly in 'universal laws' or Christian mysticism.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The target audience consists of individuals seeking practical, transformative methods for radical self-improvement across all life domains—health, finance, social standing, and inner peace. This includes those disillusioned with conventional Western solutions (e.g., traditional medicine, psychology, or strenuous 'go-getter' approaches) and those open to esoteric 'ancient wisdom.' It appeals to individuals who desire a holistic, yet 'easy and calm,' system promising tangible, accelerated results and the realization of a 'ten times greater' life, particularly by accessing hidden inner powers.
